thread.title: Messi by a nose in Knickerbocker Stakes at Belmont
thread.title_full: Messi by a nose in Knickerbocker Stakes at Belmont

title: Messi by a nose in Knickerbocker Stakes at Belmont
text:
Messi by a nose in Knickerbocker Stakes at Belmont THE ASSOCIATED PRESS  28  28   
Subjects: 
New York (1742) 
NEW YORK — Messi rallied to nail Cage Fighter by a nose Saturday in the $200,000 Knickerbocker Stakes on the turf at Belmont Park. 
It was the third win in four U.S. starts for the 5-year-old gelding bred in Germany and trained by Graham Motion. 
After dropping back to ninth, Messi surged through the stretch in a rousing rebound from a distant seventh-place finish in the Sword Dancer at Saratoga. 
John Velazquez was aboard for the 1 1/8 miles over the firm course in 1:49.70. 
Messi paid $10.20, $7 and $4.50. 
Cage Fighter, a 34-1 outsider, returned $18.60 and $6.40. Mr Speaker paid $3.60 to show.
